div.pre: 181 Sparta, Laconia, 1908 (1004) Burial: c. 222 B.C. (Noe, Hackens) Contents: 86 AR. Pot hoard from excavations Alexander III: 15 early and late post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 2, Pella 2, unc. Pelop. 1, Sardes 1, Chios 1, Damascus 1, Sidon 1, Babylon 2, unc. 4) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 3 tetradr. (Newell Salamis 15, Amphipolis 115-6) Lysimachus: 3 lifetime and post. tetradr. (Lampsacus 1, Sardes 1, Cius 1) Athens: 42 tetradr. Sparta: 7 tetradr. Seleucus I: 1 tetradr. (Laod. ad Mare as WSM 1220) Antiochus I: 1 tetradr. (Sel. ad Tigrim as ESM 149) Antiochus II: 1 tetradr. (Apameia as WSM 1142) Antiochus Hierax: 1 tetradr. (Alex. Troas as WSM 1574) Ptolemy I: 4 tetradr. Ptolemy II: 8 tetradr. Disposition: Athens † Wace, BSA 1907-8, pp. 149-58, illus. Svoronos, JIAN 1909-10, pp. 63-8; Athènes, pl. 29 Newell, Demetrius, p. 165 Noe, ANSMN 10 (1962), pp. 32-3 Hackens, Antidorum W. Peremans, pp. 72-3 (the reference to ESM p. 76 should read An- tiochus I not Seleucus II)
